channel.title: Docker images on FPFIS Documentation
channel.description: Recent content in Docker images on FPFIS Documentation

item.title: Redis
item.description: Image We recommend using the latest Redis 4.0 image Configuration See the Docker Hub’s page. Port Redis is running on port 6379 by default. Example docker run -p 6379:6379 -ti --rm redis

item.title: Varnish
item.description: Image Image is named fpfis/varnish and are based on Ubuntu. Supported version 4.1 6 VMOD included The following vmods have been included : Varnish extra vmods Drupal 7 Configuration Environment configuration env Description Default HTTP_PORT Port to listen on 8086 MAX_MEMORY Maximum memory to use for caching 1G YAML_CONF YAML file to read backend config /config.
